response.original_title: Access All Areas - The Making of Wallace and Gromit
response.overview: Directors and everyone included in the making of Wallace and gromit film; “vengeance most fowl” talk about behind the scenes and what its like and how its made.
response.tagline: Taking you behind the scenes to meet the people who make magic happen.
response.title: Access All Areas - The Making of Wallace and Gromit
